titles.title: King David Danced Before The Lord

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
King David danced before the Lord x3
On his kinsfolk it was hard,
All my sins are taken away.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
All my sins are taken away x3
I'm rejoicing night and day,
All my sins are taken away.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
The ark is coming down the road x3
Coming back to its abode,
All my sins are taken away.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
The praises go before the sword x3
For the battle is the Lord's,
All my sins are taken away.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
I'm not going to listen to any more lies x3
There's no room for compromise,
All my sins are taken away.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
There's only room for the Word of the Lord x3
And the cutting of His sword,
All my sins are taken away.
